portfolio.title: Resume
portfolio.copy: It's a resume; not too much to explain here. If you're curious about my work history or just need a piece of paper to keep on file, this is what you are looking for.

portfolio.title: Kansas City Food Not Bombs
portfolio.copy: A website for the local Food Not Bombs chapter in Kansas City. They serve free hot meals and distribute groceries and clothing to anyone in need every Sunday. This site is written in Angular 1 and utilizes the Google Maps API, a contact form which POSTs to Zapier, and some moderate CSS3 for a simple, clean layout.

portfolio.title: GitHub
portfolio.copy: Source code for my most recent projects can be found here, including this website (React), the Kansas City Food Not Bombs website (Angular), a Terraria game server (Docker), and a WIP game made with RPG Maker MV (Pixi.js).

portfolio.title: CodePen
portfolio.copy: A few items from when I was first getting the hang of modern web development. Notable items are an API-based weather widget and a pure JavaScript modal image viewer rendered in a canvas with zoom functionality.
